title: global threat data
extract: A threat intelligence feed (TI feed) is an ongoing stream of data related to potential or current threats to an organization's security. ... Threat intelligence data feeds provide users with constantly updated information about potential sources of attack.
extract_html: A threat intelligence feed (TI feed) is an ongoing stream of data related to potential or current threats to an organization's security. ... Threat intelligence data feeds provide users with constantly updated information about potential sources of attack.
